name: Helix
description: A Decentralized Crypto Exchange on Injective.

name: Talis
description: Digital marketplace for NFTs, offering a wide range of categories including digital art, animation, music, video, and photography.

name: Bitoro Pro
description: The ultimate hub for trading perps onchain. Optimized with the deepest liquidity in DeFi.

name: Mito
description: Offers vaults for decentralized finance (DeFi) investments. These vaults allow users to deposit cryptocurrencies to earn yields through various DeFi strategies.

name: Blackpanther
description: Vaults platform offers a secure way for users to deposit cryptocurrencies and earn returns through automated DeFi strategies. It simplifies yield generation, helping users optimize their investments effortlessly.

name: Ninja Blaze
description: Gaming platform offering various online games, including Jackpot, Roshambo, Double, and Lootbox.

name: Dojo
description: DojoSwap is a decentralized exchange (DEX) that facilitates secure and efficient trading of digital assets.

name: Hydro
description: Decentralized finance platform providing various financial services, including staking and lending, powered by smart contracts.

name: Gryphon
description: Decentralized finance platform offering services such as yield farming, staking, and liquidity provision.

name: Ninza xyz
description: Ninza is a platform designed for creating, managing, and trading NFTs on the Injective blockchain.

name: Kage Finance
description: Kage Finance is a comprehensive trading platform and Telegram bot designed for the Injective blockchain.

name: Injscribed
description: Multi-utility platform on the Injective blockchain offering NFT collections like Injscribed Bears and Punks, along with various games and raffles.

name: Ninjakit
description: Dashboard for managing and tracking various blockchain tools and assets.

name: Hyperlane Nexus
description: Nexus is a comprehensive blockchain and decentralized technology ecosystem providing innovative developer tools and infrastructure.

name: Neptune Finance
description: Neptune Finance is a decentralized finance platform offering lending, borrowing, and swapping services on the Injective blockchain.

name: INJ Name Service
description: The INJ Name Service on Space ID offers a decentralized domain name service for the Injective blockchain. Users can register, manage, and trade .inj domain names, enabling simplified and readable wallet addresses.
